name: A Boy Holding a Pear (Giacomo Piazzetta?)
description: A Boy Holding a Pear (Giacomo Piazzetta?); Giovanni Battista Piazzetta (Italian, 1682 - 1754); about 1737; Black and white chalk on blue-gray paper (two joined sheets); 39.2 x 31 cm (15 7/16 x 12 3/16 in.); 86.GB.677; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: A Boy Holding a Pear (Giacomo Piazzetta?)
medium: Black and white chalk on blue-gray paper (two joined sheets)
